title: Has U.S. Rep. Ilhan Omar Been a U.S. Citizen for Longer Than First Lady Melania Trump?
subtitle: CNN's Jake Tapper added an interesting perspective to the debate over President Donald Trump's verbal attack on "progressive Democrat Congresswomen" in July 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: U.S. Rep. Ilhan Omar became a naturalized U.S. citizen before First Lady Melania Trump did.
